title: Possible Asteroid Impact
description: Asteroid 2014 UR116 has a 1 in 1,000,000 chance of hitting Earth in 2041.

title: Possible Asteroid Impact
description: Asteroid 2023 DW has a 1 in 10,000 chance of hitting Earth in 2046.

title: Possible Asteroid Impact
description: Asteroid 2015 QW has a 1 in 100 chance of hitting Earth in 2049.

title: Polar Ice Caps Melt
description: The polar ice caps are forecasted to melt by 2050.

title: Global Warming
description: Global temperatures are expected to rise by 2 degrees by 2100.

title: Rising Sea Levels
description: Sea levels are expected to rise by 1 meter by 2150.

title: Desertification
description: Desertification is expected to increase by 50% by 2200.

title: Mass Extinction
description: A mass extinction event is expected to occur by 2300.
